TopicTitle: how to make emmisives that stay on

Articles.Content:
how do you make an emissve that is constantly on in game? (i'm trying to make a rocket painted with the glowing radioactive samples from the science jr)

sneak peek in unity:

Edited February 5, 2014 by laggerd
Give it the ksp emissive shader,and give it an emissive texture.
oh, I thought you had to animate it
Nothing has to be animated. It will just be on constantly...

All you need to do is click on the _EmissiveColor window and choose the color you want and the emissiveness (?), the lowest slider in the window, which should be at 255 (max) by default. So if you don't want to change the color, or change the brightness you shouldn't need to do anything beyond setting the shader.
